{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Element collecting {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Element collecting Element collecting is the hobby of collecting the chemical elements. Many element collectors simply enjoy finding peculiar uses of chemical elements. Others enjoy studying the properties of the elements, possibly engaging in amateur chemistry, and some simply collect elements for no practical reason. Some element collectors invest in elements, while some amateur chemists have amassed a large collection of elementsâ€”Oliver Sacks, for example. In recent years, the hobby has gained popularity with media attention brought by element collectors like Theodore Gray. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Element collecting)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
